page.title: 15Local Government
page.content: In this area we have a liberal Member of Parliament but the government is Conservative.My mum does not like them very much.David Penhaligon is our M.P.and he came to our school when his son was playing football against us.We won. Truro has a Mayor and two years ago Mr.Smitherman,one of our governors was mayor.He wears a big gold chain round his neck to show he is the Mayor and he came and told us all about what it means. When we have to choose a councillor or mayor we have an election but not many people bother to vote.I think they should have to.They do their voting in schools quite often and then the school is closed for the day and we do not have to come.
